DOC.brief_title: Combination Pharmacotherapy Smoking Cessation Among Methadone Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This one-arm , open label pilot study MMT patient determine whether bupropion , nicotine replacement therapy , behavioral counseling feasible potentially effective intervention smoke cessation . The smoking behavior participants follow 6 month post quit-date determine effect-size estimate future , large scale trial .
